website_summaries.verdict: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron offers some entertaining action, lots of explosions, and too many technical hiccups.
pros: Flight levels are great funSeveral sequences make you feel remarkably powerfulRoller coaster of a final levelStrong cooperative and competitive play
cons: Unfocused campaign is too often more exciting to watch than to playFinal encounter is a jokeLevel design at odds with shooting modelNumerous technical and performance issues

customer_reviews.title: Good Graphics.. hours of fun and play!
customer_reviews.text: If you own the original Transformers War For Cybertron, you will enjoy Fall of Cybertron. The graphics and game play is better in this sequel. I believe the bigger issue is the lack of players to choose from for each mission. You're fixed to only one transformer I believe. Great thing about this is I got it used for like $15 or maybe it was less. Playing these classic xbox 360 games is well worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksdude

customer_reviews.title: Love The Transformers, hate whatever this is.
customer_reviews.text: Did the people who made this game know anything about The Transformers... or making video games? Story is all messed up, like Grimlock and the Arialbots on Cybertron before the Ark left messed up. User interface is practically unplayable, horrible controls, like trying to drive a brick. Completely disappointed. At least on the last one the story was cool, this is just pathetic. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: CB3

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly fun for a fan of the franchise from way back
customer_reviews.text: This is perhaps one of the most enjoyable game campaigns I have ever played. the single player features so many nods to the original G1 series and the 1986 animated movie that you feel the need to rewatch it after. If you are a fan who maintains that love for the older episodes, then this game will certainly put a smile or 3 on your face. PS- Megatron's cannon is perhaps the most awesome primary weapon in the history of video games (nostalgia talking)
customer_reviews.author: Larry Holder

customer_reviews.title: Not enough Dinobot for me!
customer_reviews.text: The game was a basic arcade shooter with different characters assigned for each level. You pretty much advance through each level shooting and smashing and collecting heath refills and points to purchase upgrades. The snipers totally reminded me of the Jackals from Halo. There is no replay-ability unless you are playing online and I don't have Xbox live. I don't care to be online and i feel cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Magoo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Bought early for Christmas. Didn’t work. Seller refused to let me return/refund because I was past the time.
customer_reviews.author: Angella

customer_reviews.title: Great game and story!
customer_reviews.text: This game is a spectacular follow up to the first; Transformers War for Cybertron. The best part, as well as a slight draw back, is that this game doesn't follow the same game play mechanisms as it's previous release. It makes the game a fresh of breathe air, at the same time it can be a little of an annoyance if you were fond of the original lay out. All in all this game is a must play. The storyline is beautifully done, video scenes are gorgeous and the game play is fun as hell. Do yourself and some friends a favor and get the game already
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: We played this game when it came out. I beat it and loved it. The gameplay is fun. Who doesn't love blowing stuff up as a Transformer. This is for my son b/c he now loves it too. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Barnett

customer_reviews.title: The Fall rises to the top.
customer_reviews.text: This game is by far the BEST Transformers game made. Each mission is unique with its own sets of things to find, see, and hear. The weapons are upgradeable (you can actually see the upgrade changes and notice the difference in the weapons' effects), the environment has its own little hidden gems, and each character has their own special ability. One of the great things you can do is have Grimlock pick up Decepticons and throw them at other Decepticons.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoyed this from back in the day.
customer_reviews.text: After so much time, it's awesome to play a transformers game.
customer_reviews.author: OB

customer_reviews.title: transformers fall of cybertron likes and dislikes
customer_reviews.text: Transformers Fall of Cybertron is a amazing game, no lie, but it had its problems- like you had to buy some characters sold separately (like the Dino- bots ).There is also no 2 player, but on the bright side you get a 13 mission long campaign and cool xbox live multi- player. Overall, this is one of the best transformers games ever!
customer_reviews.author: William D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding game
customer_reviews.text: This game is absolutely outstanding, not sure if that might have some biased to it due to me being a transformers fan but nevertheless it is a great game. Although the character selection and co-op has been removed they have lengthened the story and made it more character focused and driven. I don't have any really qualms or issues with it, it is a worthy sequel to War For Cybertron if not better than the original and definitely deserves to be in your collection.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Carter

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy. They were for my grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Quite happy. They were for my grandchildren, who are tickled pink with the game!
customer_reviews.author: S. G. C.

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Single player game was way better than I prepared myself for: awesome graphics, decent story-line, customization weapons and mods, and challenging! I haven't played much of the multiplayer version which did take a bit to get accustomed too, but again I didn't play it much nor did I purchase it for the online version.
customer_reviews.author: CarbineFoX

customer_reviews.title: Son is loving this game
customer_reviews.text: He really enjoyed playing through the campaign and now is enjoying continuing to play . The graphics aren't bad on a small screen (30" tube tv ) . A large improvement over the first game which we never finished . He says the missions are better in this game.
customer_reviews.author: hyfynut

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Picked it up for cheap, and there's not much to dislike. The multiplayer left more to be desired, however. Far too many children online, and as an adult I don't want to hear screeching kids with their headsets on. Sometimes I either just want to play in silence, or try to play with someone my own age, but that was always difficult. The prices of the multiplayer DLC is also outrageous too. And it's a shame because I'd buy that Dinobots DLC for less than $5 in a second. $10 though? No.
customer_reviews.author: Amadeus

customer_reviews.title: Hell yes
customer_reviews.text: This is what War for Cybertron should have been, it is amazing in all aspects, such a HUGE improvement over WFC! The campaign and multiplayer are excellent! the graphics are better and the gameplay is more interesting and the hardest difficulty is less frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Neverdweller

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Used product in great condition. Price was fair and received item as promised
customer_reviews.author: R. Diggs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Game for Transformer fans!!
customer_reviews.text: A bit short, but probably because I wanted to savor every second. Some great gameplay where you get to play as a lot of different Transformers with a lot of cool abilities. Added bonus, some lines from the old movie. A must play for any Transformers fan!
customer_reviews.author: SecretAsianSam

customer_reviews.title: Good price ...Great game
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my Son.....hes very pleased with it ! It was a good price
customer_reviews.author: ramona cheasebro

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with my grandson who is a transformer guy. It seems to be exactly what he had expected so I am happy. Also it arrived in time for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: DAISY

customer_reviews.title: Fun online and story mode
customer_reviews.text: Most likely the closest you will ever get to playing the Generation one characters in a video game. Multiplayer is surprising fun and evenly matched(so most likely not going to get destroyed against other players). Story mode is also enjoyable, playing different characters per each level.
customer_reviews.author: L52

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting for some time for a price drop on this game and it finally happened. If you want to relive the fun and excitement of the Transformers series, this is it. All of your favorite characters and in this game and it fun playing as each one. It's a fairly short story mode but every moment is filled with everything you would expect from the Transformers. I haven't played the mulitplayer yet but I look forward to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Turner

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Great! Amazing and fun game!
customer_reviews.text: Great, awesome single player. I don't have xbox live but the single player on this game is a lot of fun, especially the shout outs to the old series and the movie. High Moon nailed it on this one. So much so in fact that I'm thinking of getting a live account so I can customize a character.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Chandler

customer_reviews.title: A happy kid
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this game for his XBox 360. It is his go to after he's done with his homework. This game is exactly what he wanted and it makes me happy to see how much he uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Mico0994

customer_reviews.title: Transformers: War for Cybertron - Xbox 260
customer_reviews.text: Had to get it again every true Transformers fan should have this in the collection. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Good but could've been great
customer_reviews.text: I am a longtime fan of the original Transformers cartoons. I enjoyed the 1st game a lot & had high hopes that this game would have splitscreen co-op like the Halo & COD games of late. But no!! Transformers Developers need to realize not everyone wants to play games online. My kid & I play splitscreen games all the time & was very unhappy that this game couldn't be played splitscreen. Other than that gripe, the game is very solid with the gameplay, audio & of course graphics. Hopefully next time splitscreen will be added for offline & online play.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Impact

customer_reviews.title: My Son loves this game!
customer_reviews.text: My Son saved up his money to puchase this game and he absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MzTobias

customer_reviews.title: great game!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas and he loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for fans
customer_reviews.text: Grew up on transformers in the 80s. This is the sequel to war for cybertron and doesn't disappoint. Story mode is decent but multiplayer is where the real fun is. This game and war for cybertron are a must for any fan, they are the best transformers games.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Game
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves this game. He may go a few months without playing it and then gets right back into it during his video time for a few weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my little son, we played together and I did like the story line of the game good graphics and my son really enjoyed playing it. Good game and good story line likely to recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the gameplay!
customer_reviews.text: Smooth control inputs, awesome storyline, good weapon selection, and seamless game play made this an excellent gaming experience. Would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Love it even more than War for Cybertron

customer_reviews.text: Love the game. It is an interesting game. If you are into the Transformer genre then you must get this game.

customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew so I really can't say too much but he is very happy with it. All that matters

customer_reviews.title: Fall of Cybertron
customer_reviews.text: I choose this rating because I like the series movie and mostly special effects when the cars transform in robots. I like the actions involving battles between machines (autobots and decepticons). I dislike the plot Fall of Cybertron. I think it could be better. If you like the series movie it's a good game, but don't wait for amazing graphics and exciting battles.

customer_reviews.title: 10 out 10
customer_reviews.text: Wow no one knows what this game is untill they play it if you love transformers you gona love this one to i didnt play the movies games for transformers and i will never but this one is something you cant find in movies try it out

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: Played this game and it was not as fulfilling as I expected. To do any of the custom stuff you must have xbox live and I do not use the xbox enough to justify paying for gold.

customer_reviews.title: Good successor to WoC
customer_reviews.text: I have Transformers: WoC and loved it, so when I got FoC I wasn't disappointed. The SP campaign is well done from both sides, so you will sometimes see the same fight but from a totally diff't perspective (and outcome). The MP is even better than in WoC.

customer_reviews.title: Tansformers, More Than Meets The Eye, Seriously the ending is a real cliff hanger.
customer_reviews.text: An okay campaign as expected from a sequal the whole dynamic has been dumbed down, however this is made up by the multi-player, the best yet.

customer_reviews.author: Max 5 Martinex Reviews

customer_reviews.title: ... the years but this is perhaps one of the best ever made in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: There have been many Transformers games over the years but this is perhaps one of the best ever made in my opinion. An original story as a prequel to the G1 series with slick visuals and fast paced, very fun combat, you cannot go wrong with a game like this. Its a great game for any transformers fan and is a great sequel to War For Cybertron. Even more so than just a transformers game, I would call it one of the best games out there as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bott

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband-to-be, who is a big time Transformers fan. He's played for hours on end over the past month and really enjoys it. I personally think the graphics and the gameplay are impressive. This was a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: APK

customer_reviews.title: A  must have for transformers fans
customer_reviews.text: The sequel to War for Cybertron, this game has all of the great things from the first game, and then some. The story is amazing and has some great sequences, along with the awesome multiplayer. It also features a new version of "Escalation" which is basically horde mode. Although coop campaign is gone, this is still a masterpiece. All transformers fans need to do themselves a favor and pick this one up.
customer_reviews.author: PorkChop

customer_reviews.title: The DVD is in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.text: It meets my expectation. The DVD is in excellent condition.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Grimlock Smash!
customer_reviews.text: Totally fun for any diehard TF fan. I've played through the campaign twice now and really enjoy the multiplayer as well. Gameplay is similar to the Gears of War series, but with the ability to change into a vehicle at will and run down your enemies.

customer_reviews.title: Great game!

customer_reviews.title: The Great War in an Xbox 360 world

The gameplay is straight forward, great visuals and depth... very gripping storyline. Definitely for the Transformers fan that `saw it all'.

Gameplay wise not much has changed since the first game and that's not a bad thing. Both campaigns are very enjoyable. If you liked the first, don't miss this one!

product_meta.title: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Xbox 360
product_meta.description:
Transformers: Fall of Cybertron transports you to the final days of the planet Cybertron where you will experience the darkest hours of the apocalyptic war between the Autobots and Decepticons. Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through a wide range of missions and massive environments designed around each character's unique abilities. With the stakes higher than ever before, you play as a variety of Transformers, including Grimlock's nearly indestructible T-Rex form and the legendary Combaticons forming into the colossal Bruticus. Fight through both sides of the Transformers' most epic battles leading to their legendary exodus from their home world.

AMAZON.COM



 Transformers: Fall of Cybertron is a third-person shooter that returns players to the Transformer's planet of Cybertron for the final battles of the legendary war that preceded their arrival on Earth. The game continues the story of the earlier game, Transformers: War for Cybertron. Players experience the war from both the Autobot and Decepticon point of view, and utilize new powerful transformer types. Additional features include: epic large scale battles, character specific abilities, character customization, improved enemy AI, varied mission play, and online multiplayer. 





Live the last days of the fight for Cybertron.
View larger 



Utilize powerful, new Transformer types.
View larger 

EXPERIENCE THE LAST DAYS OF CYBERTRON
 Transformers: Fall of Cybertron transports you to the final days of the planet Cybertron where you will experience the darkest hours of the apocalyptic war between the Autobots and Decepticons. Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through a wide range of missions and massive environments designed around each character's unique abilities. Fight through both sides of the most epic battles leading to their legendary exodus from their homeworld. In addition, players experience action in the form of new Transformer bot types Combaticons, Insecticons, and Dinobots. 

KEY GAME FEATURES
 * Apocalyptic Setting - Set in a desolate, post-apocalyptic Cybertron, the game thrusts players straight into an epic Transformers story as seen through the eyes of both the Autobots and Decepticons. From the Iacon Wasteland, to The Sea of Rust, explore the devastated ruins of Cybertron and play through the final, darkest hours of the war.
 * New Kinds of Transformers - Expand the action with new Transformers, including Combaticons, Insecticons, and Dinobots
 * Characters Convert from Robot to Alternate Form - Characters convert from robot to alternate mode to defeat their enemies. Grimlock can change into his powerful T-Rex Dinobot form for super strength and fire-breathing attack, and the Combaticons can combine into the massive Bruticus to dominate his enemies with this sheer size and power.
 * Impactful Gameplay Variety - Every character is equipped with distinct abilities and personalities that are suited for each of the diverse missions in the game. Cliffjumper can cloak himself invisible to unleash undetected stealth kills on his enemies. Optimus Prime can call in targeted artillery strikes from the sky.
 * Massive Customization with Character Creator - The most robust character creator ever seen in a Transformers game allows fans to design personalized characters from scratch by choosing their individual body parts, colors, vehicle shapes, weapons, abilities and more. Gamers can then take them online to go head-to-head in brutal Autobot vs. Decepticon matches to prove their supremacy.
 * Epic Scale - Fall of Cybertron delivers epic battle on a massive scale. The settings and the characters are huge. Battlefields will quake with the with the fury of gigantic Transformers, and the city-sized Autobot Metroplex changes the scale of everything.
 * Multiplayer with Truly Custom Transformers - The battle continues online with thrilling multiplayer combat. Drop into deep multiplayer modes with with up to 12 players. Create your own Transformers using a character creator that offers unprecedented choice.
 * New AI System - Players are challenged in the single-player campaign by improved enemy artificial intelligence.

ADDITIONAL SCREENSHOTS
